column4: Hi, I have a problem with a freshly set-up ubuntu 9.04 server
after I log in it runs fine for some time and then jsut freezes
If it happens to freeze while I'm typing something, it tells me <1>BUG: unable to handle kernel
but I didn't know about var/log/messages, I'll have a look thanks
Well, [S|G], I got as far as "could not find map file" when it froze again
I've gogoled that but I only find threads from people compiling their own kernels
I downloaded when it came out and kept the cd
I just installed that Image I had, but told it to get security updates
I imagine sudo apt-get update wouldn't do because of freezing
but I can give it a shot
not sure if thats the same you're experiencing, but updating might help if you can do it
surprisingly update worked, but it doesen't look like he actually installed anything
